data.title: How old is the captain?
data.statement:
In the old parchment there is a lot of information, among all this information includes the age of Captain Cordy.
Parchment contains n lines, a line contains one or zero numeric information.
These clues will always be enough to find the correct line containing the age of the captain:
We know that the grammatical construction :
    The captains age is stated as "Captain ___ years old" case insensitive,
    ___ may contain more text than just a number. 
We know that captain Cordy's age is above 18, below 100

testCases.title: Many captains
testCases.testIn:
3
captain cordy likes to sail
Many captains are 55 years old
but captain Cordy is 30 years old

testCases.title: Many captains - val
testCases.testIn:
3
captain cordy likes to sail
Many captains are 60 years old
but captain Cordy is 45 years old

testCases.title: Captain family
testCases.testIn:
5
when captain was 16 years old, he already wanted to became captain.
captain's son is 18 years old,
his wife is 45 years old,
captain is 50 years old,
captain's daughter is 12 years old.

testCases.title: Captain family - val
testCases.testIn:
5
when captain was 13 years old, he already wanted to became pirate.
captain's son is 18 years old,
his wife is 48 years old,
captain is 52 years old,
captain's daughter is 11 years old.

testCases.title: Captain boat
testCases.testIn:
3
captain has 25 boats
favorite captain boat is 100 years old
captain is 60 years old

testCases.title: Captain boat - val
testCases.testIn:
3
captain has 20 boats
favorite captain boat is 100 years old
captain is 45 years old

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read line:string(1024)
write captainCordyAge
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> an integer [[N]] = number of lines in parchment
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> a [[line]] in parchment

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the old parchment there is a lot of information, among all this information includes the age of Captain Cordy.
Parchment contains n lines, a line contains one or zero numeric information.
These clues will always be enough to find the correct line containing the age of the captain:
We know that the grammatical construction :
The captains age is stated as "Captain ___ years old" case insensitive,
___ may contain more text than just a number.
We know that captain Cordy's age is above 18, below 100
Input
Line 1 : an integer N = number of lines in parchment
Next N lines: a line in parchment
Output
Line 1: One integer CaptainCordyAge
Constraints
1 < N < 10
18 < CaptainCordyAge < 100
Example
Input
1
Captain is 60 years old
Output
60
